text: Sipho is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. The name of the genus Sipho Mörch, 1852 [ex Klein] has become invalid and is a synonym of Colus Röding, 1798. A previous use of the genus name Sipho T. Brown, 1827 is now a synonym of Puncturella WoRMS : Sipho; accessed : 7 November 2010 ==Species== All the species that used to belong to the genus Sipho have become synonyms of other species in the family Buccinidae. * Sipho astrolabiensis Strebel, 1908: synonym of Prosipho astrolabiensis (Strebel, 1908) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae
title: Sipho
